thread.title: BofA Puts Broker Head Growth at Merrill Over Costs
thread.title_full: BofA Puts Broker Head Growth at Merrill Over Costs - WSJ

author: Michael Wursthorn
title: BofA Puts Broker Head Growth at Merrill Over Costs
text:
Merrill Lynch continues to ramp up its spending to add more financial advisers.
Bank of America Corp.’s brokerage unit gained 193 financial advisers in the third quarter to bring its total adviser force to 14,563, the unit’s sixth-consecutive quarter of adviser growth, the company disclosed Wednesday in reporting its quarterly earnings. So far this year, Merrill has added 478 advisers, with the majority of those hires coming from...
